channel.title: [DELTA] Object Command
channel.description: Okay Guys, I deleted my object command.. Lol, can someone make me one please? I am asking you to make one because I never worked with objects that much soooo... You couldn't expect me to know the codes lol... I just need a Object command Please. Please and thank you. -- CP

item.title: [DELTA] Object Command
item.dc:creator: @Control_Pride Control Pride
item.description:
@Control_Pride wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:380307”] if (command.startsWith("object") && playerRights >= 3) { try { makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)), 1, 10); } catch (Exception e) { sM("Eh...try again"); } }[/quote]Thank you usman555, Rep ++

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Object Command
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("object") && playerRights >= 3) { try { makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)), 1, 10); } catch (Exception e) { sM("Eh...try again"); } }

item.title: [DELTA] Object Command

item.description:
@Control_Pride wrote:

Okay Guys, I deleted my object command… Lol, can someone make me one please? I am asking you to make one because I never worked with objects that much soooo… You couldn’t expect me to know the codes lol… I just need a Object command Please.
Please and thank you.
– CP
